creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: round, black organic form resembling a sand dollar at C; other black forms with carved lines and geometric motifs scattered, overlapping gray bars and other forms; vertical gray bar from top to bottom; small green form R of C; small teal form bottom C
signed: in pencil, bottom margin: [(Wind and Butterfly) 7/20 A. Uchima, 1959]
title: Wind and Butterfly
